strings.logisticsEmergencyImageOneCaption: The IFRC warehouse in Panama is where relief items are prepositioned for deployment across the Americans in case of disaster.
strings.logisticsEmergencyImageTwoCaption: The IFRC warehouse in Panama is where relief items are prepositioned for deployment across the Americans in case of disaster.
strings.logisticsEmergencyImageThreeCaption: Nassau, Bahamas - Red Cross logistics delegates Maureen Koch and Annahita Nikpour, oversee the loading of food supplies and cooking kits on to a ship at the port in Nassau. This humanitarian relief was shipped to Abaco and Grand Bahama as part of the response to Hurricane Dorian, which hit the Bahamas on Sept. 1, 2019.
strings.logisticsEmergencyImageNineCaption: A plane with relief supplies from Panama arrived to the Bahamas on Thursday 5 September 2019
strings.logisticsEmergencyImageTenCaption: October 2018. Palu, Indonesia - Indonesian Red Cross is focusing on relief distributions, evacuations, water distribution, medical aid and restoring family links.
strings.logisticsEmergencyImageElevenCaption: July 29, 2019 - Brindisi airport, Italy - Relief items being loaded on a cargo plane for delivery to Venezuela.
strings.logisticsEmergencyCapacityDescription: Logistics ERU organizes logistics in the field and is developed to effectively manage the arrival, clearance, storage and distribution of relief items. The logistics ERU also arranges logistics for arrival of other ERUs.
strings.logisticsEmergencyServicesDescription: The Logistic ERU can provide the following services:
strings.logisticsEmergencyServicesItemOne: Mobilization of goods, including dealing with customs, air operations, and supply chain.
strings.logisticsPersonnelCompositionValue: Team Leader, 1-2 Supply Chain Administration delegates, AirOps delegate, 1 - 3 Warehouse/Transport delegates.
strings.logisticsStandardCompositionText: The existing kits are as follows:
strings.logisticsStandardCompositionTextListTwo: ERU ADMINISTRATIVE STARTER KIT, 1 office, 3-5 persons
strings.logisticsStandardCompositionTextListSix: PERSONNEL FIELD KIT, for 4 persons/10 days
strings.logisticsSpecificationsWeightValue: 10 MT, Includes 2 x Toyota Land Cruiser and one 4x4 forklift
strings.logisticsSpecificationsVolumeValue: 100 CBM, Includes 2 x Toyota Land Cruiser and one 4x4 forklift
